Women and Girls
Fashion and Apparel
Olympic Games (2012)
Discrimination
Muslims and Islam
Uniforms
lead_paragraph: To create a more “attractive presentation,” the Badminton World Federation has decreed that women must wear skirts or dresses to play at the elite level.
snippet: To create a more “attractive presentation,” the Badminton World Federation has decreed that women must wear skirts or dresses to play at the elite level.
